title: ATLAS
html:
ATLAS - Facial Anatomy

The ATLAS section contains detailed information about facial anatomy and how different bone structures affect facial appearance. Understanding facial anatomy is fundamental to looksmaxing.

Key topics include: facial bones, muscle structure, and proportions.

title: V-Figure
html:
V-Figure Body Shape

The V-shaped body is characterized by wider shoulders and a narrower waist. This is achieved through proper training and diet.

Benefits of V-figure: increased attractiveness, better health, improved confidence.

title: Health Guide
html:
Health and Longevity

Proper health is the foundation of looksmaxing. Good nutrition, sleep, and exercise are essential.

Topics covered: nutrition, supplementation, sleep optimization.

title: Bonesmashing
html:
Bonesmashing Technique

Bonesmashing is a technique that applies targeted pressure to promote bone remodeling. Results take time and consistent effort.

Safety first: always research and use proper technique.

title: Mewing
html:
Mewing Posture

Mewing is tongue posture optimization that can improve facial structure over time. Proper tongue position: on the palate, not on the floor of the mouth.

Results: improved jawline, better facial structure.

title: Training Guide
html:
Physical Training

Proper training is essential for developing the V-figure and overall attractiveness. Focus on compound movements and progressive overload.

Key exercises: bench press, squats, deadlifts, rows.
